attributes.action: Introduce incentive schemes for employees to work from home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government were to introduce incentive schemes to both employees and employers to encourage people to work from home then this would benefit the Environment, the employee and the employer. 

The environment would benefit as there would be less congestion on the roads, resulting in less pollution to the atmosphere.

The employee would benefit as they would not have the cost of travelling to work.

The employer would benefit as in most cases the employee would be able to do more work as there would be less interruptions and they could also have smaller premises resulting in less overheads.

With the advances in modern technology (phones & computers) there is no reason why most of the current office based staff could not do their jobs from home with maybe 1 or 2 visits to the office per week.
